# GitHub Topics

Use these topics when configuring your GitHub repository:

workflow-automation, visual-workflow, workflow-engine, python, fastapi, react, plugin-system, automation, ci-cd, release-automation, workflow-management, yaml-workflows

## Short Description (GitHub About field - ~160 chars)

A lightweight, plugin-based visual workflow management platform. Drag-and-drop workflow builder, framework-agnostic core, extensible via plugins. Build automation workflows visually, not via CLI.
